name: STRAGGUS AND HIS PALS ON A DESERTED ISLAND!
name_original: STRAGGUS AND HIS PALS ON A DESERTED ISLAND!
description:
STRAGGUS STRAGGUS STRAGGUS STRAGGUS STRAGGUS STRAGGUS

A charming little cruise which turned into tragedy... Make new friends and find love on this dangerous and thrilling adventure!
STRAGGUS AND HIS PALS ON A DESERTED ISLAND! is a small indie game created for the NaNoRenO gamejam 2023.

/ Walkthrough time: 5 minutes

/ 5 endings

/ Foul language

Instructions on dowloading the game:

/Create a new folder

/Download the exe file into it

/Download the pck file into it

/Run the exe file

/Enjoy!

STRAGGUS STRAGGUS STRAGGUS STRAGGUS STRAGGUS STRAGGUS
